name: My Beautiful Abominations: Christmas Special
description:
Its Almost Christmas and Eva's Pet Doggo Rocko has Gone missing.

Story:

You Play As Rocko, Eva's Missing Doggo, Who's Gone Missing a few Days Before Christmas. Rocko Has Wonder off Somewhere he shouldn't be. But Little Does he know he was in the Right Place at the Right Time. The Hallow Murderer Has Concerned Santa Claus and has Plans to Make Halloween A Year Holiday. It Is Up to Rocko to Stop The Hallow Murderer , Save Santa Claus all while trying to get home himself safely . Can He Survive The Hallow Murderer's Evil Scheme To Overthrow Christmas?

What to Expect:

  • 1 Ending
  • A Psx Style Feel
  • Maybe Some Happy or Sad Feels
  • Small Rpg Elements [Combat, Health Bars, Spell Casting, Boss Fights , Etc. ]
  • Only 1 Checkpoint After the First Cutscene [ So u don't have to Watch the intro again]
  • My First Ever Patrol Ai

Controls:

  • Keys 1-5 Cast Spells
  • SpaceBar = Jump
  • Esc = Pause
  • W,a,s,d = Movement
  • Shift = Sprint
